name: ADR-04 Bubbles
effect: [Security] You may place 1 of your [ADR-02 Searcher]s from in play or from your hand under 1 of your [Mother D-Reaper]s as its bottom digivolution card.[On Play] You may place 1 of your [ADR-02 Searcher]s from in play or from your hand under 1 of your [Mother D-Reaper]s as its bottom digivolution card.
